website_summaries.verdict: Power Stop delivers a top-notch product with this brake rotor kit.
pros: Has two front rotors and front brake pads made of ceramic to reduce noise fade and dust
Components are engineered to work together in this one-click brake kit
Made of pre-matched components ready to install
cons: The compatibility chart regarding what vehicles it works for may be inaccurate

customer_reviews.title: really cool
customer_reviews.text: These brake pads are really cool. You're not even gonna believe it. Like, let's say you're driving along the road, with your family... And you're driving along... And then all of a sudden there's a truck tire in the middle of the road, and you hit the brakes. Woah, that was close.
customer_reviews.author: DVanto

customer_reviews.title: Working great for me.
customer_reviews.text: This brake kit is working great on my 1999 Tahoe. Super easy to install and a very complete kit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lafrenz

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This product is a vast improvement over stock brakes for my 98 two door Tahoe. However, it is important to break them in properly.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit & performs fantastically
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly, and the packaging wasn't damaged at all. I just installed these on my 1999 Chevy Tahoe. After driving around to break them in and to take care of some errands, I can happily say that they seem to be working perfectly! It was a breeze to install and the fit was exact for my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great rotor and pad set!
customer_reviews.text: I put them on a couple weeks ago they look great hiding behind the wheel, and have better performance than stock. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Do the research b4 u buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in this product line. I installed them in the wifes 2004 liberty. I took seriously and did the suggested break in process for both front and rear rotors, which were installed within 1000 miles of one another. This was done latter part of 2issue 015 . 03/2017 we had issue with brakes and vibration when braking. Took to a local shop and they had to replace front and rear rotors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This kit was for my 1998 K1500 Z71 GMC Sierra, I purchased it thinking it would eliminate my pulsing of my brakes, found out the rear drums were not round, had them turned and the shoes on the rear were near new, together with these this truck will stop on a dime..... Love it.....
customer_reviews.author: C. Lake

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: No problems from brakes on squealing nothing very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Wendell

customer_reviews.title: Way better than stock pads and rotors
customer_reviews.text: Way better than stock pads and rotors. Easy to tell the difference from stock. Take the time to replace the o rings inside the caliper slides and use a quality synthetic brake grease, or antiseize works good too. The o rings and dust boots came with the pads. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: These make a huge difference in my 1999 Chevy Suburban 1500. With my factory OEM brakes my rear drums kept warping from the heat. So I put new rear brakes on and added the Powerstop Kit to the front. My Suburban stops so much better. It's been 6 months since I installed them and there's no signs of my rear drums warping.
customer_reviews.author: BriWigle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic brake kit. Only complaint was that I didn't get the calipers to finish the job. As long as you bed the brakes properly they are a great upgrade. I installed them on my 99 Tahoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob benson

customer_reviews.title: Great package deal
customer_reviews.text: Rotors where a perfect fit and came with all installation hardware. Breaks work great and are a dramatic improvement over factory brakes and rotors. Word of caution when purchasing this kit, install your brakes/rotors on a nearby landing strip or long vacant county road as the break in schedule is very hard to accomplish in the city.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and cured to problem of warpage causing steering ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and cured to problem of warpage causing steering instability. For a few more bucks than the standard replacements this kit is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyM

customer_reviews.title: Great stopping power
customer_reviews.text: Used on my 95 Silverado 4x4. Great stopping power worth the money. Never going back to stock brakes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops on a dime
customer_reviews.text: This set is the real deal. If you like your Chevy you spent a little extra and get good stopping power. Everything fits, the package is complete with all things you need. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Zoller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brakes
customer_reviews.text: Worked out perfect. satisfying with its braking ... super simple installation
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: I have used these before and they work great. Great stopping and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have used these before and they work great. Great stopping and long lasting. All of this and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lester J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Far better than factory. should have done this upgrade years ago.
customer_reviews.author: kayaklady

customer_reviews.title: Love them...
customer_reviews.text: I love these brakes and rotors. Runs alot cooler in stop and go traffic.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: It's too bad though because I really wanted to try them on ...
customer_reviews.text: These weren't the right size brakes for my vehicle even though the compatibility chart said they would fit. I was able to return them for a full refund. It's too bad though because I really wanted to try them on my suburban.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Braun

customer_reviews.title: No problems at all perfect fit for the tahoe
customer_reviews.text: quality product perfect fit work excellent used these on my 99 tahoe and immediately noticed the difference. Going through the warm up process shows you how solid these are
customer_reviews.author: Prime Tyme

customer_reviews.title: looks awesome, works even better!
customer_reviews.text: i loves these brakes. this is the second set i purchased (two different trucks) i love the look, but the stopping power is awesome. will continue to install on my new vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Michael simms

customer_reviews.title: so far so good, Doing the recommended brak in deffinetly is required
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, Doing the recommended brak in deffinetly is required. They were noisy at first then calmed right down after breakin
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W

customer_reviews.title: 98 GMC suburban k1500.
customer_reviews.text: Has a little more stopping power. Good quality. Put them on in 20min and all the caliper bushings fit pwrfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: 99 GMC K1500 Suburban, brakes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to replace warn out pads and rotors on wifes Suburban. They fit perfect and very happy with upgrade as the stock brakes were always less than they should of been. Truck stops better than when it was new in 99 when I got it. This is the second time I have ordered one ot these power stop kits and both times it was the best bang for the buck. If anyone is looking to replace the rotors and pads on the vechical these kits are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Night and day difference just rebuilt the front of my 97 Tahoe this was the finishing touch cant believe I waited 300k to update my brakes.
customer_reviews.author: XseriesFighter

customer_reviews.title: great quality, brakes last a long time
customer_reviews.text: great quality , brakes last a long time ,stop on a dime. cant ask for more than that
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the product
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed pyurchasing this package in the past for my Magnum and order the set for my Tahoe. Perfect fit, wne together like a dream and all is working just fine thnak you.
customer_reviews.author: Tall e Nuff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Easy to install. Metal is thicker so, less threads come through lug nuts. Not a problem..
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Holderfield

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Excellent upgrade for 99 escalade. Direct fit with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BRAKES!!!! for the money
customer_reviews.text: NEVER had a problem with this brand. FOLLOW break-in instructions and you're good. Much improved braking over OEM and actually cheaper than purchasing plane Jane parts from the local box store that won't last half as long. This is the fourth set I've installed on different Trucks that tow and haul as well as every day drivers. My one Suburban had a bad brake fade problem in the smokey mountains once that scared me pretty good, even being careful on the big hills, gearing down etc....NEVER had that happen again with these brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Vanover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, work very well on my truck, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Josh Weber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new brakes on my 94 GMC K 1500 lot better
customer_reviews.author: rich mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easily fit on 95 Tahoe with 6 lugs. Works cleanly and smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: TONY B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect stops great and it the second vehicle I've put them one and have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and they definitely improved the braking on my 99 4dr Tahoe
customer_reviews.author: Albert J. Lapeter

customer_reviews.title: They work great and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the brakes on 99 suburban with this kit. They work great and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has what you need to change out your breaks in the front...the cost is very good-it is like getting free pads with cheap rotors-but they are not "cheap" in craftsmanship or build-it is just a great bang for your buck!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice P

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: nice to spend all that money and they didn't even last 10,000 miles in my truck. I only drive it to work and back which is 20 miles one way. Sad thing is I bought for my 2006 ford fusion and they did worse
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Nice equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Not one squeak or scrape. Stops on the dime for me. Nice equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my '96 Chevy Tahoe perfectly. Break in instructions worked very well. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: NOT an 8 lug Rotor!
customer_reviews.text: This specific set does not fit 8 lug Suburbans as the ad stated and Amazon "verified" it would fit my 1996 K2500 SLE Suburban it DID NOT! The actual brake pads fit but the rotors were 6 lug not 8 lug!! Could not get customer service to understand this point either. Had to return and purchase a different set because they could not understand this fitment issue.
customer_reviews.author: Travis S.

customer_reviews.title: Beats the competition.
customer_reviews.text: I'll never use an O.E. or aftermarket Pad other then these again. Bang for you buck,,, stop you on a dime brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Henning

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: Love em so far have had em on for 10000 miles so far definitely feel a stronger braking presence on my 98 k1500. Great everything as far as install instructions and presentation goes
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Easy install , great upgrade. Be sure to do the break in process. Makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: CHANDLERSLIST

product_meta.title: Power Stop K1970 Front Brake Kit with Drilled/Slotted Brake Rotors and Z23 Evolution Ceramic Brake Pads,Silver Zinc Plated
feature_bullets: Power stop Carbon fiber ceramic compound significantly Enhances braking Performance versus traditional ceramic brake pads
Low dust braking validated through on vehicle 3rd party tests in Los Angeles, showing on average 30 percent less dust versus OE
Dual layer high temp rubberized shims insulate Noise for virtually silent braking
Drilled & Slotted Performance rotors for Maximum Cooling. They are zinc plated for Maximum Protection against rust
Brake rotor, pad & hardware Engineered to work together to increase sTopping Power, Improve durability & eliminate dust
